Option: filesystem.file_event_listeners

This option enables you to add file listener classes that gets a notification about file modification events. This can be used for logging purposes or if you need to synchronize modifications. The option should contain a comma separated list of class names, this classes needs to be included in the config.php and they should extend the FileEventListener base class.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['filesystem.file_event_listeners'] = "SomeListener,SomeOtherListener";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

filesystem.file_event_listeners=SomeListener,SomeOtherListener
